Usage¶

To get started with Odot App, follow these steps:

  1. Adding Tasks

    Click the “+” button in the center of the interface to add new tasks. Enter the task details and set the priority level.

  2. Organizing Tasks

    Drag and drop tasks between columns representing different days of the week.

  3. Viewing Priorities

    Tasks can be categorized by priority: low, medium, or high. Use the priority filter to view tasks based on their urgency.

  4. Calendar view

    A calendar integration view will display task volume on specific days.
